author: glasser
msg: New branch, for general mergeinfo API cleanup.
Specifically:
* Replace many occurences of apr_hash_t with new typedefs
svn_mergeinfo_t and svn_mergeinfo_catalog_t.
* Standardize all "hashes of mergeinfo" into one of the above types.
* Remove unnecessary mergeinfo and rangelist APIs.

author: cmpilato
msg: Recommend r29309 for backport.

author: cmpilato
msg: Prevent svnsync from printing blank lines when syncing a revision in
which no edit drive occurs (such as those resulting from an
svndumpfilter'd commit).
* subversion/svnsync/main.c
(edit_baton_t): Add 'got_textdeltas' member.
(open_root): No longer print the "Transmitting file data" bit here.
(apply_textdelta): Print the "Transmitting file data" line on the
first textdelta, and remember that we did so.
(close_edit): Only print linebreak if we saw some textdeltas.
(get_sync_editor): Switch to an apr_pcalloc() to prevent future
mistakes, and lose a redundant member init.

author: epg
msg: * subversion/include/svn_iter.h
Note that completed may be NULL in svn_iter_apr_hash and
svn_iter_apr_array doc strings.

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Note dependency information for r29284.
